analyzed: vandeham tattva rūpam tata vitata bhavam bhavya havya svabhāvam
buddhānām ādibuddham kṛta vividha hitam tejasām sannidhānam
samyaksaṃbodhi mūrti triguṇa vilasitam pañca jñāna eka hetum
nairākāram nirañjam gagana vat aniśam nirmalam citta caityam
jyotīrūpe tvadīye vinilaya tapasā dāna śīla kṣamāsu
vīrya dhyāna ākhya prajñā udadhi kṛta taraṇaḥ māṇi vṛnde sujātau

original: bodhiṃ prāpto'smi cāsmin sakalapūravare cākaniṣṭhe mahimni
analyzed: bodhim prāptaḥ asmi ca asmin sakala pūra vare ca a kaniṣṭhe mahimni
vande tvām viśvarūpam sphaṭika maṇiḥ iva upātta nānā prabhedam
nānā vaidhyam su pūjya upakaraṇam aniśam ḍhaukitam sarva lokaiḥ
kim ca aham ḍhaukayiṣye tvad anunaya manāḥ tyakta rājya ādi dravyaḥ

original: jātau jātau ca jātau kṛtasukṛtacayaṃ kāyavāṅmānasaistai-
analyzed: jātau jātau ca jātau kṛta sukṛta cayam kāya vāc mānasaiḥ taiḥ
s tat sarvam ḍhaukayiṣye nija tanu sahitam saṃgṛhāṇa subuddhe

original: ekaṃ yugmaṃ tṛtīyaṃ yugalayugamatho pañcamaṃ ṣaṣṭhasaṃjñaṃ
analyzed: ekam yugmam tṛtīyam yugala yugam atho pañcamam ṣaṣṭha saṃjñam

original: saptāṣṭau vai navākhyaṃ daśamamatha tathaikādaśaṃ dvādaśākhyam |
analyzed: sapta aṣṭau vai nava ākhyam daśamam atha tathā ekādaśam dvādaśa ākhyam
trāyodaśyam caturdaśyam atha śaraka maṭham ca ekatas saṃprasūtam

original: ānantyaṃ svaṃ tadaivaṃ jagadakhilamabhūt tvāṃ name caikarūpam || 4 ||
analyzed: ānantyam svam tadā evam jagat akhilam abhūt tvām name ca ekarūpam
ekaḥ vairocana ākhyaḥ tad apara jinaḥ buddha akṣobhya saṃjñaḥ
ratna ādyaḥ saṃbhavaḥ usau tritaya amṛtaruc saṃjñakaḥ turya saṃkhyaḥ
pañca ākhyaḥ moghasiddhiḥ tadanu ca jagati khyāta saṃkhyā ādya saṃkhyā

original: devā daityāśca martyā bhavadavayavajāḥ sarvadā'haṃ nato'smi || 5 ||
analyzed: devāḥ daityāḥ ca martyāḥ bhavat avayava jāḥ sarvadā aham nataḥ asmi
śrī śākya siṃha buddha kṛtam sragdharā pañcakam samāptam
